import{createSelector}from"reselect";import memoize from"lodash.memoize";var shopSelector=function shopSelector(state){return state.shop;};export var selectShopCollections=createSelector([shopSelector],function(shop){return shop.collections;});// same as last selector. Purpose : turn the object into an array to be iterable by .map function in the preview component.
export var selectCollectionsForPreview=createSelector([selectShopCollections],function(collections){return Object.keys(collections).map(function(key){return collections[key];});});export var selectCollection=memoize(function(CollectionUrlParam){return createSelector([selectShopCollections],function(collections){return collections[CollectionUrlParam];});});
